one_reviews_text: I was hoping you could actually use your gamepad to control the ship, but it's done via gaze navigation which takes a lot of the fun out. It's really an endless runner with short tracks. The 15 tracks are maybe 3 minutes long if that and I was able to unlock everything & beat every track in 40 minutes. You do have to do some grinding to unlock the faster ships to outrun the drones in the later levels. This is a .99 cents game at most, preferable on mobile VR.
